DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare immunosuppression protocol of tacrolimus + MMF with that of tacrolimus + steroid for preventing recurrence of hepatitis C after living donor liver transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Immunosuppression on HCV Recurrence After Living Donor Liver Transplantation - Comparative Study Between Tacrolimus + MMF and Tacrolimus + Steroid
DOC.criteria: Recipient of living donor liver transplantation for HCVrelated cirrhosis ABO blood type incompatible transplant case Renal dysfunction (serum creatinine >2.0 mg/dL) WBC < 1,000/mm3 Hemoglobin < 8 g/dL Platelet <30,000 /mm3
